name: Bomb Elevator
description:
Created as a prototype for NYU Game Design 2023 Game Feel Game Jam by Adrian Nunez,  Nirav Golyalla, and Dahriel Gonzalez

This prototype is for a platformer where the player can dash, jump and ground pound. Open the menu and see how the experience feels when the game feel elements are turned off.

Controls:

Arrow Keys: Movement

Space: Jump

Left Shit: Dash

Presentation
